name: Ellipsoids(Quadrics) Collision Detection
short_description: The library currently consists of an implementation of collision detection of static/moving ellipsoids that exploits frame-coherence using separating planes. Please visit http://www.cs.hku.hk/GraphicsGroup/cd.html for paper references.
